#summary List of technologies used for this web application

= Technologies used =

List of technologies used for the MGportal:
  * Spring Framework (version 3)
  * Apache Velocity (templating engine)
  * Apache Tiles (templating framework)
  * [http://hibernate.org/ Hibernate]
  * JavaScript libraries:
    * [http://jquery.com/ JQuery]
    * [https://developers.google.com/chart/?hl=de Google Charts]
